snippet: Hei-Kyung Hong replaced an ailing Natalie Dessay in Willy Decker’s production of “La Traviata” at the Metropolitan Opera.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews Metropolitan Opera production of Verdi's La Traviata, directed by Willy Decker and starring soprano Hei-Kyung Hong, who filled in after Natalie Dessay withdrew because of illness.
lead_paragraph: Hei-Kyung Hong replaced an ailing Natalie Dessay in Willy Decker’s production of “La Traviata” at the Metropolitan Opera.

headline.seo: Hei-Kyung Hong Stars in Willy Decker’s ‘Traviata’ at the Met
headline.main: In Verdi’s Parisian Social Whirl, a Star Shines, Then Plummets in Flames
headline.print_headline: In Verdi’s Parisian Social Whirl, a Star Shines, Then Plummets in Flames
